summary.span: 使用 方法實作執行邏輯的自訂活動抽象基底類別，可完整存取執行階段的功能。

span.span: Abstract base class for custom activities that implement execution logic using the method, which has full access to the runtime's features.

summary.span: 建立並驗證活動引數、變數、子活動和活動委派的描述。

span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity's arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂活動作者可以在活動的 覆寫中提供驗證邏輯。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 從 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 這些例外狀況會從 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity's arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程執行階段會使用 的預設實作，以確保工作流程的正確結構以及管理執行階段關聯性和存留期規則。The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage run-time relationships and lifetime rules. 預設實作會檢查活動型別使用型別的公用成員。The default implementation of examines the public members of the activity type using the type's . 這些公用成員是型別， ， [IEnumerable\<變數 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)， ， [IEnumerable\<活動 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)，或.These public members are of type , , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), or . 您可以覆寫這個方法來自訂活動的執行階段描述的建置，並提供自訂驗證邏輯。You can override this method to customize the building of the activity's run-time description and to provide custom validation logic. 從 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 這些例外狀況會從 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在繼承自 的類別中使用 CacheMetadata。The following code sample demonstrates using CacheMetadata in a class that inherits from . 這個範例取自[自訂複合使用原生活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md)範例。This example is from the [Custom Composite using Native Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_CustomCompositeNativeActivity#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_customcompositenativeactivity/cs/mysequence.cs#2)]
